DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Halloween Face Painting Stencil Kit - Pumpkin & Skull 3 color
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Halloween Face Painting Stencil Kits are perfect for making your next Halloween party memorable. Includes 2 ml Snazaroo paints in 3 colors (White, Black and Orange), a sponge applicator, stencil with skull, pumpkin, BOO and black cat. Specially designed to adjust to the curvature of the face or skin. Easy to apply and remove.
Snazaroo Mylar stencils are easy to use, durable and easy to clean. Snazaroo products are all non-toxic and hypoallergenic and meet US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3 color Snazaroo Stencil Kit will paint about 600 cheek art designs
Includes three 2 ml Snazaroo paints in White, Black and Orange, plus a sponge applicator and Mylar stencil (skull, pumpkin, BOO and black cat).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
